channel.title: Abouts on Salesforce Tek Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Salesforce Tek Talks

item.title: About Me
item.description: For 2 years, I was a Product Specialist for the Coveo for Salesforce line of business. This included troubleshooting visualforce pages, lightning communities, lightning components, apex code as well as Coveo related components. I then transitioned to becoming Coveo for Salesforce’s Technical Evangelist and I currently focus on assisting to develop and support the growing community in the Salesforce environment. I am active on the salesforce.stackexchange.com forum as well as answers.
